entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-08
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Suggest import statement based on common usage #38453
    Backlog
  • 'Add Imports' feature fails to show the expected namespace #31002
    Backlog
  • Unnecessary defensive copy in collection spread for ROS nullability change #76303
  • 'Prefer braces' feature shoudl be called 'Require braces' #29621
    Backlog
  • Prefer braces should have another option for not prefering braces iff on one line #41547
    Backlog
  • When `csharp_prefer_braces = true:error` build doesn't fail as expected. #62418
    Backlog
  • Code fix for `csharp_prefer_braces = true` adds blank line if another statement follows #70697
    Backlog
  • IDE0025 deletes comments in certain places #38058
    Backlog
  • Indenting with spaces after auto property code fix #29879
    Backlog

Updated

  • Area - Add Import #75750
    Backlog
  • Enumerators fails to set state to "after" in various scenarios observable with `GetEnumerator()` #76089
    17.13
  • IDE0079 triggering false positives on various suppressed diagnostics #75887
  • Area - Require Braces #76204
  • Area - Use Primary Constructor #76250
  • Area - Use Expression/Block Body #75777
    Backlog
  • `when_on_single_line` not enforced or supported? - [IDE0022,IDE0023,IDE0023,IDE0024,IDE0025,IDE0026,IDE0027] #69658
    18.0
  • IDE0025 strangely indents when a comment follows the property name #38057
    Backlog
  • Area - Use Auto Property #75771
    Backlog
  • Area - Remove Unused/Unread Member #76247
  • Area - Remove Unnecessary Parentheses #76274
  • "Remove and Sort Usings" Ignores #pagma warning disable IDE0005 #26245
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Support adding package and reference assemblies from an import #76337
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with remove unused members and ref-fields #76336
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix issue with nameof(MemberGroup) caused us to consider all members used #76335
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Indent expressions when converting to object initializer #76334
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix formatting of accessor blocks in 'use block body' #76333
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'sort usings' to always preserve the new-lines that were present in the document #76332
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make it clearer when 'move declaration' might change semantics #76331
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Fix broken 'convert if to switch' case with recursive analysis #76317
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Prefer ReadOnlySpan over Span as better conversion target #76300
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Add f1 item for global usings #76327
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify user experience with disparate 'generate constructor' features #76328
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
